content:
With const_panic becoming stable on nightly, would it be possible to stabilize unwrap and friends? (Option.expect(), unwrap_unchecked, etc)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/673d0db5e393e9c64897005b470bfeb6d5aec61b/library/core/src/option.rs#L382
I believe it needs const_precise_live_drops, which is currently being discussed for stabilization.
